## ImageGenerationRequest.personGeneration property

Allow generation of people by the model Supported values are: \* "dont\_allow" : Block generation of people \* "allow\_adult" : Generate adults, but not children

**Signature:**

```typescript
personGeneration?: "dont_allow" | "allow_adult";
```
